statements: UPDATE PatientHealthData SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE PatientHealthData SET blood_pressure = '110/70', heart_rate = 75 WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE PatientHealthData SET blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = 1 AND device_id = 2;
UPDATE PatientHealthData SET heart_rate = 75, timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:00:00' WHERE patient_id = 3 AND device_id = 4;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, location = 'New York' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthData SET blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Patients SET age = 25, gender = 'Male', location = 'New York' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthData SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE monitor_data SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE device_info SET manufacturer = 'Example Inc.', model = 'New Model' WHERE device_id = '765e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE monitor_data SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = 'abc-123' AND device_id = '123-abc';
UPDATE patient_info SET age = 30, height = 170.5, weight = 75.2 WHERE patient_id = 'xyz-456';
UPDATE patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe', gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE vitals SET vital_value = 98.6, timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE patient_id = 5 AND vital_type = 'Temperature';
UPDATE patients SET phone_number='123-456-7890', patient_name='John Doe' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message='Critical alert: High fever', timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE alert_id=3;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE prescriptions SET medication = 'Aspirin', dosage = '100mg' WHERE prescription_id = 2;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, name = 'Alice' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE health_data SET heart_rate = 75, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE data_id = 5;
